argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | clmsubdir.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | clmsubdir.t | |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) |
| 3 |  | clmsubdir.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 4 |  | clmsubdir.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 5 |  | clmsubdir.m | |- .- = ( -g ` W ) |
| 6 |  | clmsubdir.w | |- ( ph -> W e. CMod ) |
| 7 |  | clmsubdir.a | |- ( ph -> A e. K ) |
| 8 |  | clmsubdir.b | |- ( ph -> B e. K ) |
| 9 |  | clmsubdir.x | |- ( ph -> X e. V ) |
| 10 | 3, 4 | #P_clmsub | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ A e. K /\ B e. K ) -> ( A - B ) = ( A ( -g ` F ) B ) ) |
| 11 | 6, 7, 8, 10 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ph -> ( A - B ) = ( A ( -g ` F ) B ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( A - B ) .x. X ) = ( ( A ( -g ` F ) B ) .x. X ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( -g ` F ) = ( -g ` F ) |
| 14 |  | #P_clmlmod | |- ( W e. CMod -> W e. LMod ) |
| 15 | 6, 14 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 16 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 13, 15, 7, 8, 9 | #P_lmodsubdir | |- ( ph -> ( ( A ( -g ` F ) B ) .x. X ) = ( ( A .x. X ) .- ( B .x. X ) ) ) |
| 17 | 12, 16 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( ( A - B ) .x. X ) = ( ( A .x. X ) .- ( B .x. X ) ) ) |
